divs: Sighting Detailsi was commenting on how cloudy the sky was and that it even looked like snow clouds forming overhead, i noticed a large patch of clear blue sky, and as i focussed on to it, i noticed a Shiney silver color cigar shaped something, just hovering there. it was quite high up, i would roughly estimate about 15000 feet or so, as i was watching it, it all of a sudden shot off at a very fast rate, and disapeared into the cloud cover, just as this occured, i noticed what looked like a large passenger jet, with faint blue markings, which was escorted by up to 6 military jet fighters flying in a close formation to the larger aircraft, heading from north-east to south-west across the patch of clear sky then they all disapeared into the cloud cover. i kepts an eye open for the cigar shaped object, but it never returned and the clear patch soon filled up with grey cloud cover! the large jet looked alot like it could have been Airforce One! but i could not make any positive identification.
